LanguageData.CASPowerArmBoots.label: marine boots
LanguageData.CASPowerArmBoots.description: A pair of marine boots with layered plasteel plates and enhanced servomotors.
LanguageData.CASPowArmBootsArctic.label: marine boots (Arctic)
LanguageData.CASPowArmBootsArctic.description: A pair of marine boots with layered plasteel plates and enhanced servomotors. These boots have an arctic camouflage design.
LanguageData.CASPowArmBootsDesert.label: marine boots (Desert)
LanguageData.CASPowArmBootsDesert.description: A pair of marine boots with layered plasteel plates and enhanced servomotors. These boots have a desert camouflage design.

LanguageData.CASPowArmBootsJungle.description: A pair of marine boots with layered plasteel plates and enhanced servomotors. These boots have a jungle camouflage design.

LanguageData.CASPowArmBootsStone.description: A pair of marine boots with layered plasteel plates and enhanced servomotors. These boots have a stone camouflage design.

LanguageData.CASPowArmBootsUrban.description: A pair of marine boots with layered plasteel plates and enhanced servomotors. These boots have an urban camouflage design.
